subject: no more dying
body:
![image.png](/letters/images/434.webp) 

![image.png](/letters/images/433.webp) 

![image.png](/letters/images/435.webp) 

years ago i recorded a musical setting of frank o'hara reading his poem "[ode to joy](https://apoemaday.tumblr.com/post/655892715316314113/ode-to-joy)" and last night i cut a video from "[third avenue el](https://archive.org/details/ThirdAve1950)", a short film that provides a beautiful snapshot of the fifties new york that was o'hara's milieu. you can [watch it here](https://www.instagram.com/absence.of.field/reel/C2tvkkfrOBI/).

![image.png](/letters/images/437.webp) 

![image.png](/letters/images/436.webp) 

![image.png](/letters/images/438.webp) 

### Previously on this day

- [2016](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/thank-you-notes-ashley/) (ashley) (_the relief that time provides, hurricane theory, not puking_)
- [2017](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/13017/) (_salt and vinegar chips, fleabag, rihanna_)
- [2018](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/130-9017/) (_heated airport shuttle_)
- [2019](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/12919-3155/) (_secular faith, running water_)
- [2020](https://buttondown.email/justinwolfe/archive/130/) (_dim sum order, not having sex with a horse, improvisation game_)
